text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar Simply delusional #Trump  #coronavirus None  of the people in those 80 pages  of  #RedDawn emails will  lie  for you anymore. You caused  20,000 people to die. You have alienated every sailer, the FBI, the CIA.  It will end at some point &  not well for you or your family.
